commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/** Computes the amount of a sloppy phrase match, based on an edit distance. * This value is summed for each sloppy phrase match in a document to form * the frequency to be used in scoring instead of the exact term count. * *

A phrase match with a small edit distance to a document passage more * closely matches the document, so implementations of this method usually * return larger values when the edit distance is small and smaller values * when it is large. * * @see PhraseQuery#setSlop(int) * @param distance the edit distance of this sloppy phrase match * @return the frequency increment for this match */ public abstract float sloppyFreq(int distance);
commits.sourceOld:

A phrase match with a small edit distance to a document passage more * closely matches the document, so implementations of this method usually * return larger values when the edit distance is small and smaller values * when it is large. * * @see PhraseQuery#setSlop(int) * @param distance the edit distance of this sloppy phrase match * @return the frequency increment for this match */ public abstract float sloppyFreq(int distance);
